page.title: 16RECREATION AROUND OSSINGTON.
page.content: Forms of{recreation}in this country area are quite varied. There is a common interest in{gardening}with the added bonus of producing fresh fruit and vegetables for the home and freezer. On a wider front, interests range from taking an active part in {gymkhanas}and the showing of{shire {horses}and{goats}to playing{cricket, watching{rugby}and{campanology.}Most of these activities take place outside the block with which we are dealing and it is necessary to travel to a different area to participate in such pursuits. There is an interest in {field sports}i.e.{hunting, shooting and{fishing}although shooting rights are strictly reserved. The land is hunted over by hounds in pursuit of foxes during the appropriate season and with the permission of the land owner.
